net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--Collect the data on the Leader Power being used--> [h:debugmode = getLibProperty("DEBUGMODE")] [h:debugmacro = getMacroName()] [h:LeaderPowers = getProperty("LeaderHealing")] [h:powerName = macro.args] [h:healPower = json.get(LeaderPowers, powerName)] [h:powerAbilBonus = json.get(healPower, "abilityBonus")] [h:powerBonusHP = json.get(healPower, "bonusHPDice")] [h:powerRange = json.get(healPower, "range")] [h:powerUses = json.get(healPower, "usesLeft")] [h,if(json.contains(healPower, "usesTargetSurge")==1): powerUsesTargetSurge = json.get(healPower, "usesTargetSurge"); powerUsesTargetSurge = "Yes"]
<!--Pull the proper bonus amount from the character casting the power--> [h,switch(powerAbilBonus): case "Strength": fixedHPBonus = StrBonus; case "Constitution": fixedHPBonus = ConBonus; case "Dexterity": fixedHPBonus = DexBonus; case "Intelligence": fixedHPBonus= IntBonus; case "Wisdom": fixedHPBonus = WisBonus; case "Charisma": fixedHPBonus = ChaBonus; case "None": fixedHPBonus = 0;] [h,if(powerBonusHP != "None"): hpDiceBonus = eval(powerBonusHP); hpDiceBonus = 0]
<!--If the power has been used the maximum number of times, abort the macro with an error message--> [h:assert(powerUses > 0, token.name+" cannot use "+powerName+" again during this encounter", 0)]
<!--Get the targets in range (and whether a PC or NPC is calling the power, so we know who to put in the target list--> [h:me=getName()] [h:calledByPC=isPC(me)] [h:maxRange=powerRange] [h,if(calledByPC):expList=json.toList(getTokenNames("json", '{pc:true, visible:true, unsetStates:["Dead","Reticle"], range: { from:1, upto:'+maxRange+', distancePerCell:false, metric:"ONE_ONE_ONE"}}')); expList=json.toList(getTokenNames("json", '{npc:true, unsetStates:["Dead","Reticle"], visible:true, range: { from:1, upto:'+maxRange+', distancePerCell:false, metric:"ONE_ONE_ONE"}}'))]
<!--Add yourself to the list, since powers can be used on yourself--> [h:expList = listAppend(expList, me)]
<!--Algorithm for assembling a list of targets with token images--> [H: imgList = expList] [H: Num = listCount(imgList)] [h,COUNT(Num),CODE: { [h:targetName=listGet(imgList,roll.count)] [h,token(targetName): image=getTokenImage()] [h:imgList=listReplace(imgList,roll.count,targetName+" "+image)] }]
<!--Create the input() dialog to ask if any additional bonus HP is coming down the pike--> [h:status=input( "targetNum|"+imgList+"|Use "+powerName+" on|LIST|SELECT=0 ICON=TRUE ICONSIZE=30", "miscExtraHP|0|Misc Extra Healing (do not include Healer's Lore or similar features)")] [h:abort(status)]
<!--Get the selected target, and check if the target can benefit from it or if they have no surges left--> [h:target=listGet(expList,targetNum)] [token(target),CODE: { [if(powerUsesTargetSurge == "Yes" && SurgeRemaining < 1):assert(0, target +" has no surges remaining, and cannot benefit from "+powerName, 0)] }]
<!--Deduct this usage from the power, and update the power JSON so that it knows how many uses are left--> [h:powerUses = powerUses - 1] [h:healPower = json.set(healPower, "usesLeft", powerUses)] [h:LeaderHealing = json.set(LeaderHealing, powerName, healPower)] <!--Gray out the button if the power is used up for this encounter--> [h,if(json.get(healPower, "usesLeft") < 1): setMacroProps(powerName, "color=gray;"); ""] [h,if(powerName=="Lay on Hands"): SurgeRemaining = SurgeRemaining -1]
[h:switchToken(target)] [h:surgeHP = SurgeValue] [h,if(powerUsesTargetSurge == "Yes"): SurgeRemaining = SurgeRemaining - 1] [h:totalAdditionalHP = fixedHPBonus +if(powerName == "Healing Spirit", 0, hpDiceBonus) +surgeHP] [r:procHealing(totalAdditionalHP,"regains","Leader",miscExtraHP, powerName, target)]

[switch(clearCond),CODE: case "Do Not Remove Any Conditions": { }; case "Remove All Conditions": { [h:currConds = json.fields(ExternalTiming)] [h,foreach(condition,currConds),CODE: { [h,if(condition == "SecondWindBonus"): restoreDefenses("SecondWindBonus")] [h,if(listFind(defAdjust,condition)!=-1): restoreDefenses(condition)] [h,if(listFind(attAdjust,condition)!=-1): restoreAttacks(condition)] [h:ExternalTiming = json.remove(ExternalTiming, condition)] [h,if(listFind(realMarks,condition)!=-1): MarkedBy = ""; MarkedBy = MarkedBy] [h,if(listFind(rvAdjust,condition)!=-1):restoreRV(condition)] [h:setState(condition, 0)] }] [r:currConds] conditions removed. }; default: { [h,if(clearCond == "SecondWindBonus"): restoreDefenses("SecondWindBonus")] [h,if(listFind(defAdjust,clearCond)!=-1): restoreDefenses(clearCond)] [h,if(listFind(attAdjust,clearCond)!=-1): restoreAttacks(clearCond)] [h:ExternalTiming = json.remove(ExternalTiming, clearCond)] [h,if(listFind(realMarks,clearCond)!=-1): MarkedBy = ""; MarkedBy = MarkedBy] [h,if(listFind(rvAdjust, clearCond)!=-1):restoreRV(clearCond)] [h:setState(clearCond, 0)] [r:clearCond] condition removed. };]

<!--Gather information on Conditions--> [h,if(json.isEmpty(TempResist)==0): resList=json.fields(TempResist); resList = ""] [h,if(json.isEmpty(TempVulnerable)==0): vlnList = json.fields(TempVulnerable); vlnList = ""] [h:extCondList = json.fields(ExternalTiming)]
<!--Reset defense adjustments if necessary--> [h,if(listFind(extCondList, "SecondWindBonus") !=-1 ): restoreDefenses("SecondWindBonus")] [h,if(listFind(extCondList, "DefensePenalty")!=-1): restoreDefenses("DefensePenalty")] [h,if(listFind(extCondList, "DefenseBonus")!=-1): restoreDefenses("DefenseBonus")]
<!--Reset temporary vulnerability or resistance if necessary--> [h,foreach(tmpCondition,resList),CODE: { [tmpAdj = json.get(TempResist, tmpCondition)] [Resist = json.set(Resist, tmpCondition, json.get(Resist,tmpCondition)-tmpAdj)] }]
[h,foreach(tmpCondition,vlnList),CODE: { [tmpAdj = json.get(TempVulnerable, tmpCondition)] [Vulnerable = json.set(Vulnerable, tmpCondition, json.get(Vulnerable,tmpCondition)-tmpAdj)] }]
<!--Clear or reset all condition properties on the token--> [h:ExternalTiming = "{}"] [h:OngoingDamage = "{}"] [h:setAllStates(0)] [h:setProperty("TempResist", "{}")] [h:setProperty("TempVulnerable", "{}")] [h:setProperty("LastDefenseAdjustment", json.set("{}", "Defense", "AC", "adjustment", 0))] [h:setProperty("LastAttackAdjustment", json.set("{}", "adjustment", 0))]
All conditions removed.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Mass Remove Condition

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h:initGroup = listSort(getSelectedNames(), "N+")] [initGroup] [h:keyToken = listGet(initGroup,0)] [h,token(keyToken): Init = 1d20+InitBonus]
[r,foreach(token,initGroup),CODE: { [token(token),CODE: { [h:addToInitiative()] [h:setInitiative(Init)] [outputTo("self", getName(token)+" initiative roll: "+Init)] }] }] [h:sortInitiative()]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Group Initiative

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h:assert(isGM(), "Only the GM may use the "+getMacroName()+" macro",0)] [h:ActionPoints = ActionPoints + 1] [r:token.name] has achieved a Milestone, and gains one action point.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Grant Milestone

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h:continue=input(".|This utility copies macros to another token. Note: it will not copy powers from||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", ".|one token to another. For that, use the Copy Power to Other Token macro located on||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE", ".|the character token. Hit OK to continue, or Cancel to exit.||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE")] [h:abort(continue)] [h,if(getMacros() != ""): fullMacList = getMacros(); assert(0, "There are no macros on the token "+token.name+"", 0)] [h:fullMacList = listSort(fullMacList,"N+")] [h:fullMacList = json.fromList(fullMacList))] [h:macList = json.unique(fullMacList)] [h:inputParams = ""] [h:groupArray = "[]"] [h:macrosInGroup = "{}"] [h:inputParams = json.append(inputParams, "copyTab|Copy Settings||TAB")] [h:inputParams = json.append(inputParams, "copyTo|"+getTokenNames()+"|Select destination token|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING")] [h:inputParams = json.append(inputParams, "appendInc|0|Add suffix to macro label (so that duplicate macros are not created)|CHECK")] [h:inputParams = json.append(inputParams, "suffix|(copy)|Enter suffix to append")] [h:tmpArray = ""] [h,foreach(macro,macList),CODE: { [indexes = getMacroIndexes(macro)] [foreach(index,indexes): tmpArray = if(getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"group") == "", json.append(tmpArray, "Top Level"), json.append(tmpArray, getStrProp(getMacroProps(index), "group")))] }] [h:uniqueGroupArray = json.unique(tmpArray)] [h:uniqueGroupList = json.toList(uniqueGroupArray)] [h:uniqueGroupList = listSort(uniqueGroupList, "N+")] [h,foreach(uniqueGroup, uniqueGroupList),CODE: { [tempObj = ""] [h,foreach(macro,macList),CODE: { [indexes = getMacroIndexes(macro)] [h,foreach(index, indexes): tempObj = if( if(getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"group")=="", "Top Level", getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"group")) == uniqueGroup, listAppend(tempObj, macro), tempObj)] }] [h:macrosInGroup = json.set(macrosInGroup, uniqueGroup, tempObj)] }] [h,foreach(uniqueGroup, uniqueGroupList),CODE: { [macroLabels = listSort(json.get(macrosInGroup, uniqueGroup), "N+")] [h:inputParams = json.append(inputParams, "group_"+roll.count+"|"+uniqueGroup+"||TAB")] [h:inputParams = json.append(inputParams, ".|Select the Macros you wish to copy. Make sure to configure the copy settings in the Copy Settings tab.||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE")] [foreach(macroLabel, macroLabels),CODE: { [idx = getMacroIndexes(macroLabel)] [foreach(index, idx): inputParams =if(if(getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"group")=="", "Top Level", getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"group")) == uniqueGroup, json.append(inputParams, "macro_"+index+"|0|"+macroLabel+" "+if(getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"tooltip")=="", "(no tooltip available)", "("+getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"tooltip")+")")+"|CHECK"), inputParams)] }] }] [h:inputParams = json.toList(inputParams, "##")] [h:status = input(inputParams)] [h:abort(status)] [h,foreach(macro,macList),CODE: { [macroIndexes =getMacroIndexes(macro)] [foreach(index, macroIndexes),code: { [macProps = getMacroProps(index, "json")] [currLabel = json.get(macProps, "label")] [newLabel = currLabel + suffix] [checked = eval("macro_"+index)] [if(appendInc): macProps = json.set(macProps, "label", newLabel)] [if(checked),token(copyTo): createMacro(macProps)] }] }] Macros copied.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Copy Macros

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h,if(getMacros() != ""): fullMacList = getMacros(); assert(0, "There are no macros on the token "+token.name+"", 0)] [h:fullMacList = listSort(fullMacList,"N+")] [h:fullMacList = json.fromList(fullMacList))] [h:macList = json.unique(fullMacList)] [h:inputParams = ""] [h:groupArray = "[]"] [h:macrosInGroup = "{}"] [h:tmpArray = ""] [h,foreach(macro,macList),CODE: { [indexes = getMacroIndexes(macro)] [foreach(index,indexes): tmpArray = if(getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"group") == "", json.append(tmpArray, "Top Level"), json.append(tmpArray, getStrProp(getMacroProps(index), "group")))] }] [h:uniqueGroupArray = json.unique(tmpArray)] [h:uniqueGroupList = json.toList(uniqueGroupArray)] [h:uniqueGroupList = listSort(uniqueGroupList, "N+")] [h,foreach(uniqueGroup, uniqueGroupList),CODE: { [tempObj = ""] [h,foreach(macro,macList),CODE: { [indexes = getMacroIndexes(macro)] [h,foreach(index, indexes): tempObj = if( if(getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"group")=="", "Top Level", getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"group")) == uniqueGroup, listAppend(tempObj, macro), tempObj)] }] [h:macrosInGroup = json.set(macrosInGroup, uniqueGroup, tempObj)] }] [h,foreach(uniqueGroup, uniqueGroupList),CODE: { [macroLabels = listSort(json.get(macrosInGroup, uniqueGroup), "N+")] [h:inputParams = json.append(inputParams, "group_"+roll.count+"|"+uniqueGroup+"||TAB")] [h:inputParams = json.append(inputParams, ".|Select the Macros you wish to delete. Note: There is no undo!||LABEL|SPAN=TRUE")] [foreach(macroLabel, macroLabels),CODE: { [idx = getMacroIndexes(macroLabel)] [foreach(index, idx): inputParams =if(if(getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"group")=="", "Top Level", getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"group")) == uniqueGroup, json.append(inputParams, "macro_"+index+"|0|"+macroLabel+" "+if(getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"tooltip")=="", "(no tooltip available)", "("+getStrProp(getMacroProps(index),"tooltip")+")")+"|CHECK"), inputParams)] }] }] [h:inputParams = json.toList(inputParams, "##")] [h:status = input(inputParams)] [h:abort(status)] [h:delMacroUndo = "{}"] [h,foreach(macro,macList),CODE: { [macroIndexes =getMacroIndexes(macro)] [foreach(index, macroIndexes),code: { [checked = eval("macro_"+index)] [if(checked): delMacroUndo = json.set(delMacroUndo, macro, getMacroProps(index, "json"))] [if(checked): removeMacro(index)] }] }] [h:setProperty("Rumble.DeleteMacroUndo", delMacroUndo)] Macro(s) removed.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Delete Macros

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h:deletedMacros = getProperty("Rumble.DeleteMacroUndo")] [h:deletedMacroList = json.fields(deletedMacros)] [h:status = input("macToRestore|"+deletedMacroList+"|Choose Macro to Restore|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING")] [h:abort(status)] [h:restoreProps = json.get(deletedMacros, macToRestore)] [h:createMacro(restoreProps)] [r:macToRestor] macro restored.
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Undo Macro Delete
